name: ext_R5_PaymentReconciliation_allocation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PaymentReconciliation.allocation for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents PaymentReconciliation.allocation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PaymentReconciliation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: Distribution of the payment amount for a previously acknowledged payable.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
